description: This file defines authentication-related API routes using FastAPI, including user registration and login, utilizing security dependencies and database repositories.

methods.name: register(form: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = Depends(), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: API endpoint to register a new user and return an access token.

methods.name: login(form_data: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = Depends(), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: API endpoint for user login to obtain an access token.

ctags.name: login
ctags.pattern: /^def login(form_data: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = Depends(), db: Session = Depends(get_db)):$/

ctags.name: register
ctags.pattern: /^def register(form: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = Depends(), db: Session = Depends(get_db)):$/
